name: boxed::convert::<impl core::convert::From<string::String> for boxed::Box<(dyn core::error::Error + core::marker::Send + core::marker::Sync + 'a)>>::from

boxed::Box::<T>::new.doc:
Allocates memory on the heap and then places `x` into it.

 This doesn't actually allocate if `T` is zero-sized.

 # Examples

 ```
 let five = Box::new(5);
 ```
